file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 35-20-03-04 - ALTITUDE SENSING SWITCH - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL ALTITUDE SENSING SWITCH - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the altitude sensing switch. B. The altitude sensing switch is installed on the control pedestal. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 35-20-03-000-801-A ALTITUDE SENSING SWITCH - REMOVAL ALTITUDE SENSING SWITCH - INSTAL- ALL 35-20-03-400-801-A LATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 35-20-03 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 35-20-03-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. ALTITUDE SENSING SWITCH - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to remove the altitude sensing switch. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 20-13-10-000-801-A/400 CONTROL PANELS - REMOVAL (TYPICAL) AMM TASK 34-61-02-000-801-A/400 CONTROL DISPLAY UNIT (CDU) - REMOVAL AMM TASK 34-62-02-000-801-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 01 Does the task Cockpit I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the FMS Control Panel: • ( AMM TASK 34-61-02-000-801-A/400) aircraft equipped with single FMS. • (AMM TASK 34-62-02-000-801-A/400) aircraft equipped with dual FMS. (2) Remove the Pitch and Turn Controller ( AMM TASK 20-13-10-000-801-A/400 ). (3) Open the “PASS OXYGEN DEPLOY 1” and “PASS OXYGEN DEPLOY 2" circuit breakers. J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Disconnect the electrical connector (1) from the altitude sensing switch (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 35-20-03 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Loosen the attachment clamp (2). (3) Remove the altitude sensing switch (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 35-20-03 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Altitude Sensing Switch - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONES 123 124 DET. A 1. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR B 2. CLAMP 3. ALTITUDE SENSING SWITCH 1 4. BLANKING PLUG DET. B 1 REMOVE THE BLANKING PLUG (4) BEFORE YOU INSTALL THE ALTITUDE SENSING SWITCH (3). 145AMM350023.MCE B EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 35-20-03 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 35-20-03-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. ALTITUDE SENSING SWITCH - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to install the altitude sensing switch. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 20-13-10-400-801-A/400 CONTROL PANELS - INSTALLATION (TYPICAL) AMM TASK 34-61-02-400-801-A/400 CONTROL DISPLAY UNIT (CDU) - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 34-62-02-400-801-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 01 Does the task Cockpit I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A CAUTION:BEFORE INSTALLATION, MAKE SURE THE BLANKING PLUG (4) IS REMOVED. IT CAN CAUSE MALFUNCTION TO THE SYSTEM. (1) Put the altitude sensing switch (3) in position and tighten the attachment clamp (2). (2) Connect the electrical connector (1). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close the “PASS OXYGEN DEPLOY 1” and “PASS OXYGEN DEPLOY 2” circuit breakers. (2) Install the FMS Control Panel: EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 35-20-03 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL • ( AMM TASK 34-61-02-400-801-A/400) aircraft equipped with single FMS. • (AMM TASK 34-62-02-400-801-A/400) aircraft equipped with dual FMS. (3) Install the Pitch and Turn Controller ( AMM TASK 20-13-10-400-801-A/400 ). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 35-20-03 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
